Body:
"""
        Test that a KmipOperationFailure exception is raised when the
        backend fails to register a key.
        """
status = enums.ResultStatus.OPERATION_FAILED
reason = enums.ResultReason.GENERAL_FAILURE
message = 'Test failure message'
result = results.OperationResult(contents.ResultStatus(status), contents.
    ResultReason(reason), contents.ResultMessage(message))
error_msg = str(KmipOperationFailure(status, reason, message))
key_value = b'\x00\x01\x02\x03\x04\x05\x06\x07\x08\t\n\x0b\x0c\r\x0e\x0f'
key = objects.SymmetricKey(enums.CryptographicAlgorithm.AES, 128, key_value)
client = ProxyKmipClient()
client.open()
client.proxy.register.return_value = result
args = [key]
self.assertRaisesRegex(KmipOperationFailure, error_msg, client.register, *args)
mock.patch('kmip.pie.client.KMIPProxy', mock.MagicMock(spec_set=KMIPProxy))
